H3.text: what sort of government does nigeria have. Federal republic

A4.text: Nigeria is a federal republic comprising 36 states and the Federal Capital Territory

A5.text: The president is both head of state and head of the federal government. The president is elected by popular vote to a maximum of two four-year terms

A6.text: Official website, Government of Federal Republic of Nigeria
